keyMoments.moment: Nami officially joins as the crew's navigator
keyMoments.significance: The crew gains its third official member and a crucial navigator for their journey to the Grand Line

keyMoments.moment: The crew departs from Cocoyashi Village
keyMoments.significance: Sets sail toward new adventures with their complete East Blue roster

membershipChanges.description: Nami officially becomes a permanent member after being freed from Arlong's control
